hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abdullah that the Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) said:"When you are three, two should not converse (privately) to the exclusion of their companion, because that makes him sad

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَتَنَاجَى اثْنَانِ دُونَ الثَّالِثِ
chapter.eng-name: Two should not converse to the exclusion of a third
